column4: okay thanks meskarune. One more question, is the invertor the video cable attatched to the display?
there's a little-known, easy, positive test for a bad invertor...
if you hold an ne-2, ne-51, or similar neon bulb near the high voltage leads coming out of the invertor, it will glow in the presence of high voltage
the neon bulbs are available from Radio Shack or similar stores for less than a dollar
